verses.name: Leviticus 22:26
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Leviticus 22:27
verses.text: When a bullock, or a sheep, or a goat, is brought forth, then it shall be seven days under the dam; and from the eighth day and thenceforth it shall be accepted for an offering made by fire unto the Lord.

verses.name: Leviticus 22:28
verses.text: And whether it be cow or ewe, ye shall not kill it and her young both in one day.

verses.name: Leviticus 22:29
verses.text: And when ye will offer a sacrifice of thanksgiving unto the Lord, offer it at your own will.
